attributes.action: REGULATION ON THE PRESS TO STOP `FALSE` STORIES WITH REPORTERS KEEPING WITHIN THE PUBLIC LAWS AND NOT THERE OWN.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT THE `PRESS` TO ONLY PRINT `FACTS` AND NOT MADE UP STORIES, ANY STORY NOT BEING TRUE THEY MUST PAY `DAMAGES` TO THAT PERSON FOR ANY DISTRESS CAUSED, THEY LIKE THE PUBLIC MUST KEEP WITHIN THE LAW AND NOT BEING THERE OWN LAW MAKERS.
ALL `REPORTERS` WORKING EITHER FOR THE MEDIA OF ON THERE OWN FOR PROFIT `MUST` ALSO ABIDE WITH THINGS LIKE `TRESPASS` AND GOING THROUGH PEOPLES RUBBISH WHICH THE PUBLIC CAN NOT DO AGAINST ANOTHER IN THERE STREET OR ANY RUBBISH TIP, ANY INFORMATION MUST BE GOT IN A LEGAL MANOR ONLY AND NOT `BACK HANDERS` TO THE POLICE OR ANY OTHER CONCERN WHICH IS `DATA PROTECTED`, ANY ONE CAUGHT DOING SO SHOULD HAVE MORE ADDED ON A SENTANCE FOR BREACHING `TRUST`.
